kubernetes_add_node_pool_description: Configure an initial node pool when creating the cluster. A node pool is a group of worker nodes that all have the same configuration. You can then create, delete or resize multiple node pools.
kubernetes_add_node_pool_warning: It is recommended that you configure a pool with a minimum of 3 nodes in order to optimise the rolling upgrade when you carry out security updates (patch updates) or minor version upgrades.
kubernetes_add_node_pool_node_count: Number of nodes in the pool
